article_title: Kraft recalls 36,000 cases of cheese singles over choking hazard
article_text:
Ten customers have reported the plastic wrapper sticking to a cheese slice, and three of those have reported choking, according to the company.

"We deeply regret this situation and apologize to any consumers we have disappointed," said the Heinz-Kraft recall statement.

article_metadata.description: Kraft voluntarily recalled 36,000 cases of Kraft Singles American and White American prepared cheese product due to a choking hazard, NBC reports.
article_metadata.author: Elisha Fieldstadt
